Class VisualNumerics.math.MathException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----VisualNumerics.math.MathException
public class MathException
extends Exception
Signals that a mathematical exception has occurred.

MathException()
Constructs an MathException with no detail message.
MathException(String)
Constructs an MathException with the specified detail message.

MathException 
  public MathException()
Constructs an MathException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.
MathException 
  public MathException(String s)
Constructs an MathException with the specified detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.
Parameters:
s - the detail message
